name: Me Mr Mouse Demo
description:
Are You Looking For A Challenge Of 28 Levels Where You Blindly Find Your Way Through Hot Coals That Instantly Kill You On A Ledge Of Invisible Ink Just For The Fun Of Destroying Your Braincells?

Well You Have Come To The Right Place!

Hard Puzzles, Annoying Narrators, We've Got It All!

C'mon, Just Try, You'll Be Surprised How Annoying This Is!

(The Trailer Is A Cover Up)
